name: 林宇欣
title: 战略分析师 | 运营增长操盘手 | AI独立开发者
title_en: Strategy analyst | Growth hacker | AI developer
bio: 从LSE金融风险管理，到立讯精密跨境并购与战略落地；从运营校内万人社群，到独立开发AI效率工具。我相信战略的眼界、运营的温度与技术的效率可以共同推动真实增长。目前专注于用AI与数据重构决策流程与用户体验。
bio_en: From LSE Financial Risk Management to Luxshare Precision's cross-border M&A and strategic implementation; from operating a 10,000-member campus community to independently developing AI efficiency tools. I believe that strategic vision, operational warmth, and technical efficiency can jointly drive tangible growth. Currently focused on reconstructing decision-making processes and user experiences with AI and data.
